title: MTA FOIL Request Log for 2021 and 2022

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the log of all Freedom of Information Law requests made with the agency for calendar year 2021 and 2022. I ask that all fields — including the date, requester, description and disposition — are included.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A spreadsheet of data with the dates and locations (stations) of fare evasion arrests in the New York City Subway system from January 1, 2018 to the day this request is fulfilled. I request all records in the database with one row per arrest. 

If there are any concerns with whether this request can be filled please refer to previous requests for similar data, which were fulfilled on appeal with the appeal ID 13PL102781.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: General Aviation Activity Survey of helicopter flight hours

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: General Aviation Activity Survey of helicopter flight hours
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting the annual estimates of helicopter flight hours, broken out by make and model, generated as part of the annual General Aviation Activity Survey. I ask that you release each year's numbers for all models from 2016 until the day this request is fulfilled.

These records have been produced in the past by your agency in response to similar requests. You can find one here https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/3932859-FAA-FOIA-for-helicopter-flight-hours

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
